title: [综合l管理]StaffX —— 更方便的管理员工具可以让管理员管理玩家更加方便[1.8]
author: 不死之躯
txt_content:
首先这个插件还是bate版可能有BUG


默认指令/sc /sct /cps


钻石铲： /fly 可以让管理员飞行
火焰棒：/Launcher 改变管理员的速度
钻石[雾]：/RandomTP 随机tp一名玩家


权限：
staffx.reload:[size=14.6667px] Permission to /staffx reload
staffx.freeze:[size=14.6667px] Permission to /freeze
staffx.mode:[size=14.6667px] Permission to /staff and all in it
staffx.sv:[size=14.6667px] Permission to /sv (vanish)
staffx.svlist:[size=14.6667px] Permission to /svlist
staffx.svsee:[size=14.6667px] Permission to see users in /sv
staffx.sc:[size=14.6667px] Permission to /sc and /sct
staffx.cps:[size=14.6667px] Permission to /cps
staffx.mode.blockedit:[size=14.6667px] Allows breaking/placing blocks in /staff
staffx.mode.invedit:[size=14.6667px] Allows editing inventory in /staff


命令：
() indicates mandatory arguments, <> indicates optional arguments

[size=14.6667px](StaffVanish) - /sv:[size=14.6667px] A nice and simple vanish command that will hide you from all players without the vanish-see permission node.
[size=14.6667px](StaffVanishList) - /svlist:[size=14.6667px] Will list all users that are currently in staff-vanish(/sv).
[size=14.6667px](StaffMode) - /staff:[size=14.6667px] Will put you in a convenient staff-mode with your inventory safely stored and the ability to restore it/exit staff-mode by simply running the command again.
[size=14.6667px](StaffChat) - /sc (message...):[size=14.6667px] Will send all online users with the correct permission whatever the specified message is. The (message...) represents whatever you wish your message to be.
[size=14.6667px](StaffChatToggle) - /sct:[size=14.6667px] Toggles staff-chat on. Indentical to /sc, but this one is a nice toggle on/off for it.
[size=14.6667px](Freeze) - /freeze (target):[size=14.6667px] Will deny block-breaking and movement for the frozen target. To ensure no one is accidentally frozen forever, frozen players reset upon server reload/restart.
[size=14.6667px](ClicksPerSecond) - /cps (target) <length in seconds>:[size=14.6667px] Will run a very accurate click test on the specified player. If you do not specifiy the length of the click test, it will be 10 seconds long by default.
[size=14.6667px](StaffXHelp) - /staffx help:[size=14.6667px] Will display a handy-dandy menu of all the commands and their syntax/format to ensure you know the primary commands for the plugin.
[size=14.6667px](StaffXReload) - /staffx reload:[size=14.6667px] This will reload the config(s), therefore updating any changes made in the configs without having to reload/restart the server.

[groupid=1306]Bone Studio[/groupid]

replies.author: 不死之躯
replies.txt_content:
Mine_永恒 发表于 2017-10-30 14:34
怎么用，能自己改吗？
m貌似不能，晚上我把剩下的翻译了，中午没时间了，感谢支持[要不"0.0"]0
如果功能更多一点就好了，但这个插件还挺不错
